Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Expands the veterans tuition awards program to allow the transfer of unused benefits to a spouse, survivor or child
Summary: Expands the veterans tuition awards program to allow the transfer of unused benefits to a spouse, survivor or child; defines terms.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to expanding the veterans tuition awards program to allow the transfer of unused benefits to a spouse, survivor or child
